description.en:
1.) Apron Attack!!: "Shuu Sakata comes home after a long day of work, only to find his wife Reiko in a naked apron!"  
  
2-5.) Shujin to Maid to 2-gou-chan (Maid & Master & #2-chan): "When Masaru Satou's childhood friend, Akina Shidou, finds the hidden maid costume in his closet, she tries it on, only to lead up to having to obey her master, Masaru-kun!"  
  
6.) Menkui!*: A story between a fierce girl named Manami Ichijou, and a kind boy named Shou Umezawa.  
  
7.)Nayamashi Sisters (Troublesome Sisters): Story between Akito Hiiragi and his two sisters.  
  
8.) Nayamashi Lover (Troublesome Lover):   
9.) Nayamashi Trio (Troublesome Trio)  
10.) Trouble Position  
11.) Ubu na Kankei (Innocent Relations)  
12.) Sister or Lover  
Bonus: Menkui! After  
Bonus: Menkui! Toranoana Limited Edition Omake**  
  
*: An extra story can be found in Harem Time, Menkui! in Resort  
**: Limited extra for those who bought the volume on Toranoana
description.ja:
『COMIC快楽天』の超新星・toshの初単行本！
『COMIC快楽天』第22回新人賞作家・toshが描くラブリー短編集です。メイドや美人姉妹との大乱交をはじめ、幼なじみや義妹など柔肉ラインナップで送る超鉄板仕様。美少女にうるさい「めんくい」な読者のニーズに応える1冊です。

biography.en: Pen name of the mangaka [Saeki Shun](https://mangadex.org/author/dd80291f-b15d-4ce7-9e20-9bf63f21f5f3) for Hentai works.

**Native name**: 佐伯俊 

**Circle name**: Hikakuteki Simple na Panty

**Alt. names**:
tosh

Started manga career with hentai works under the pen name tosh.
